name: Scyther
author: Hajime Kusajima
flavor_text: While young, they live together deep in the mountains, training themselves in how to fight with their scythes and move at high speeds.

attacks.name: Twin Play
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Scyther and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.
